WorkItem.ClosedComment: An informative message is displayed with the thrown exception
WorkItem.Description:
I am getting an exception while trying to validate an expression.
Exception is "Object reference not set to an instance of object".

My expression is: 
(A>B) + 10 with A=1, B=2

How this error can be removed or is there any better error we can display in this case?

Regards,
Abhishek Shukla
